sentences.sContent: The valuation becomes a benchmark against which to judge other prices.
sentences.sCn: 这个估价成了判断其他价格的依据。

remMethod.val: bench(法官席， 引申为法律) + mark(记号) → 将法律作为我们的基准尺度 → 基准

trans.tranCn: 基准； 用于比较分析的基本性资料
trans.tranOther: something that is used as a standard by which other things can be judged or measured
